scripts.build: octopus player/index.8o bin/bad-apple-high-quality.8o HIRES && octopus player/index.8o bin/bad-apple-full.8o LORES && cat bin/bad-apple-full.8o | pbcopy
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-binaries && npm run build-html
scripts.build-binaries: npm run build && octo bin/bad-apple-full.8o bin/bad-apple-full.ch8 && octo bin/bad-apple-high-quality.8o bin/bad-apple-high-quality.ch8
scripts.build-html: mkdir -p dist && npm run build && octo --options octo-config-lores.json bin/bad-apple-full.8o dist/full.html && octo --options octo-config-hires.json bin/bad-apple-high-quality.8o dist/high-quality.html
